sub_title: Business Program Manager (PMP) | Passionate About Delivering Business Value
summary:
Mark at a glance:
*  15 years of professional Program and Project Management experience; certified PMP & Prince2; Bachelors in Computer Science and Business Information Systems.
*  A breadth of experience managing Agile, Waterfall and hybrid type projects.
*  Extensive experience managing global remote and cross-functional teams to deliver successfully.
*  References have said this about Mark: “actively involved in driving and contributing to delivery”; “extremely technically competent and learns new technologies quickly”; “capable, thorough and well organized”; “fresh style of thinking and honesty”
*  Mark is passionate about delivering Business Value

Mobile: +31687234895  |  Email: career@markg.co.za

school.name: Cranefield College of Project and Programme Management

education.degree_name: Advanced Diploma in Project and Programme Management

education.field_of_study: Technika Electronics, Computer Studies, Mathematics, Physics, English, Afrikaans

awards.title: Philips Eager to Improve and Inspire
awards.description: Thank you for the tireless efforts to improve our UAT process and deliver a highly successful result.  The level of visibility and control we have thanks to your drive is really inspiring the program to improve other areas.
awards.issuer: Alan Robertson - Business Architect and Release Manager

awards.title: Philips Team Up to Win
awards.description: Thank you for the great organization. You've built and led a team for our largest ever UAT, maintaining a strong structure with clear reporting - making it easy for teams to function at their best.
awards.issuer: Alan Robertson - Business Architect and Release Manager

awards.title: Clicks Group AfriCan Achievement Award
awards.description:
..for his professionalism, tenacity and ‘can do’ attitude, in the execution of ‘Sorbet Gift
Card’ project particularly over a period (Christmas) when it becomes significantly
challenging to keep parties focussed and committed to delivery. To this end, Mark did
not wait for any instruction to get third party issues resolved, he got into his car, met
the at the third party offices and ensured misunderstandings were resolved
collaboratively. Further to this, on hearing that the “Sorbet Gift Cards” were still at the
Distribution Centre and were not in the pilot stores, Mark ensured that these cards
were collected and delivered to the store to ensure nothing prevented his
implementation of the project. Well done Mark, great to have such an inspirational
colleague
awards.issuer: Whisaal Tiki – Head of Project Delivery Management

awards.title: Nielsen Simply Excellent Gold Award
awards.description:
"Since joining Nielsen in October 2011, Mark as PM on the Reach and Read Africa Expansion program has driven integration cross functionally. Working for the overall success of the program, Mark has worked tirelessly with the various functions to reduce risks and to define new processes / ways of workings to ensure quality and timely delivery of the program in line with client expectations. Mark has also successfully implemented a number of reporting tools which have resulted in simplification. A superb start to his career at Nielsen!"

Electronic certificate: http://goo.gl/YBI78

awards.title: Old Mutual Certificate of Appreciation
awards.description:
"Your example and ability to get things done is an inspiration to us all."

Electronic Certificate: http://goo.gl/5k1VF

awards.title: Chairperson Student Body
awards.description: Represented student issues on school's governing body in 1999 and 2000

projects.title: Clicks OMNI Channel
projects.description:
Project/ Program managed Clicks OMNI Channel IT program comprising of Pharmacy services, new Mobile application and product enhancements.  Worked closely with Head of Digital, Business Programme Manager, Head of IT, Solutions Delivery Executive and implementation teams in Clicks IT and vendors: SQLi Commerce and TCS (Hybris development); Deloitte Digital and TCS (mobile application development).

The program included (in summary) delivery key pharmacy services on multiple digital channels and a mobile application on both IOS and Android to support business and customer expansion and retention objectives.

Team size:		15+

contributors.headline: Business Program Manager (PMP) | Passionate About Delivering Business Value

projects.title: Launch New Business Product
projects.description:
Mark project managed the launch of a new business product range.  He worked closely with Clicks Business Development Manager, Product Portfolio Manager, Demand Manager, and implementation teams at Clicks IT, EasyPay, Electrum, ESP Online and Sorbet to deliver on the project.  

The project included (in summary) delivery of new Sorbet gift cards within the Clicks store chain.  It required architectural changes to the existing gift card process as well as introduced new vendors.  Mark took on the project mid-implementation with no clear project plan nor a previous project manager.  He worked with teams to break down communication barriers and deliver on business objectives set out.

Team size:		15+

Project managed launch new Property24 business in Indonesia.  Worked closely with General Manager and local Indonesian Country Manager as well as local cross functional team members (in Marketing, Product Management, Operations) to deliver on project.

projects.title: ABSA Homeowners App
projects.description:
Project Managed release of software to ABSA to support the ABSA Homeowners Mobile App.  Mark was brought on board to take the project to release and closure and resolve critical issues delaying the launch of the app.  He implemented communication lines that removed 50% unnecessary stakeholders, streamlining communications and created a focus on delivery.  Mark identified and facilitated discussions with the correct team members, keeping the larger stakeholder group updated regularly.  Successful delivery of this project resulted in him becoming Property24’s liaison to the banking accounts team.

projects.title: Tiendatek South Africa Pilot
projects.description:
Working with a team spanning Mexico, Spain and South Africa (Cape Town and Johannesburg), I managed the end to end rollout of this technology product to micro and small businesses in Johannesburg.

We achieved an 85% success rate during the pilot with 60% of users continuing to use the product 6 months post pilot close.  These results far exceed a similar parallel pilot in Delhi, India.  The success has been attributed to tight execution, monitoring and controlling of the project and quick and effective responses to risks.

Team size:		10+

projects.title: Business Expansion into Africa
projects.description:
Strategic program on the organization’s scorecard. Managed the roadmap of the program across 34 African countries. Ensured alignment of the cross-functional teams to the plan through effective communication and coordination. Reported locally, regionally and globally.  Reduced time required to prepare detailed reports from 3 days to 4 hours by using technology to allow team members to provide updates in a standard format, online and automated reports to pull in the relevant updates.
Projects included survey preparation; survey execution and data capture; universe estimation, sample design, and recruitment instructions; universe updates; preparation and delivery to the client.

Team size:		20+

profile_positions.description:
As a Workstream Lead on the second largest transformation program, Mark was responsible for all releases across 2 programs and dependancies with other programs and teams. 
* 95% on time stage gate delivery
* introduction of release management governance, standard work and best practices
* embedded detailed quality and compliance standard work into projects
* owned and maintained multi-year delivery roadmap
profile_positions.title: Program Workstream Lead

profile_positions.description:
Mark was responsible for the project management on a new global service business model.  
* delivery of a global business blueprint with a global team of experts
* Implementation of the blueprint in Western Europe
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Domains: Health Tech, Customer Service

At Philips, Mark fulfilled roles as Project Manager and Requirements Management process owner on a global program, In both roles Mark worked cross-functionally to deliver large-scale projects.  

Project Manager:
* Delivered global projects with virtual team 
* Simultaneous releases in 15 Markets (including North America, Europe, APAC)

Project Management Process Owner:
* Designed and implemented the end-2-end Business Requirements Standard Operating Process for projects.  This includes processes on how to gather Business Requirements from a globally dispersed stakeholder group, funnelling Requirements through the process from illicitation to User Story Backlog, process Design Factories, Quality review processes and User Acceptance.
* Designed and implemented playbooks and supporting controls for running large scale Design Factories and UATs (2 weeks dedicated testing, up to 700 testers and 1000 stakeholders)
* Knowledge sharing with other programs on how to implement best practices
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager
